title: Check for duplicate name and date of birth (response)
description: Response for checking if name and date of birth match an existing account.

new_account_check_duplicate_phone_and_do.title: new_account_check_duplicate_phone_and_dob
new_account_check_duplicate_phone_and_do.description: The result of checking for duplicate name and date of birth

has_duplicate.description: 1 if a matching account was found, 0 if not

msg_type.description: Action name of the request made.

req_id.description: Optional field sent in request to map to response, present only when request contains `req_id`.
